events.doc: Fires when a node is loaded

events.name: move
events.doc: Fires after the component is moved.

events.name: movenode
events.doc: Fires when a node is moved to a new location in the tree

events.name: nodedragover
events.doc: Fires when a tree node is being targeted for a drag drop, return false to signal drop not allowed...

events.name: nodedrop
events.doc:
Fires after a DD object is dropped on a node in this tree. The dropEvent
passed to handlers has t...

events.name: removed
events.doc: Fires when a component is removed from an CQ.Ext.Container

events.name: render
events.doc: Fires after the component markup is rendered.

events.name: resize
events.doc: Fires after the component is resized.

events.name: selectionchange
events.doc: Fires when a node is selected.

events.name: show
events.doc: Fires after the component is shown when calling the show method.

events.name: startdrag
events.doc: Fires when a node starts being dragged

events.name: staterestore
events.doc: Fires after the state of the component is restored.

events.name: statesave
events.doc: Fires after the state of the component is saved to the configured state provider.

events.name: textchange
events.doc: Fires when the text for a node is changed

events.name: titlechange
events.doc: Fires after the Panel title has been set or changed.
